file.name: request_body_direct.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Swagger Petstore - OpenAPI 3.0
paths:
  /pet:
    post:
      operationId: addPet
      requestBody:
        description: Create a new pet in the store
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/PetRequest"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/PetResponse"
components:
  schemas:
    PetResponse:
      required:
        - name
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
  requestBodies:
    PetRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            required:
              - id
            type: object
            properties:
              id:
                type: string

Error: parse: paths: /pet: post: addPet: requestBody: content: application/json: parse schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/requestBodies/PetRequest": resolve reference "#/components/requestBodies/PetRequest": invalid schema reference "#/components/requestBodies/PetRequest"
